title: Crash-test cockroaches inspire wall-climbing robot
text:
Crash-test cockroaches inspire wall-climbing robot   01:57 
The cockroach's ability to quickly switch from walking on the ground to climbing a wall is helping scientists develop fast-reaction robots able to change direction and climb over obstacles without relying on complex and expensive sensors. Matthew Bell reports.   
The cockroach's ability to quickly switch from walking on the ground to climbing a wall is helping scientists develop fast-reaction robots able to change direction and climb over obstacles without relying on complex and expensive sensors. Matthew Bell reports.  //reut.rs/2Jjo3pJ
